languages.text: {n}Выпятив мощную челюсть, Соломон хмуро произносит:{/n} "Если такова ваша воля — все кончено. Я не смею требовать объяснений".
{n}His jaw clenched, Solomorne says with a frown,{/n} "If such is your wish, then it is done. I dare not demand an explanation."
languages.original_text: {n}Выпятив мощную челюсть, Соломон хмуро произносит:{/n} "Если такова ваша воля — все кончено. Я не смею требовать объяснений".

{n}His jaw clenched, Solomorne says with a frown,{/n} "If such is your wish, then it is done. I dare not demand an explanation."

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは歯を食いしばり、眉をひそめながら言った。{/n}「それがあなたのご意志であるのなら、従います。理由をうかがうなど、恐れ多くてできません」
languages.original_text: {n}His jaw clenched, Solomorne says with a frown,{/n} "If such is your wish, then it is done. I dare not demand an explanation."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは歯を食いしばり、眉をひそめながら言った。{/n}「それがあなたのご意志であるのなら、従います。理由をうかがうなど、恐れ多くてできません」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne beißt die Zähne zusammen und sagt mit gerunzelter Stirn:{/n} "Wenn das Euer Wunsch ist, soll es geschehen. Ich wage es nicht, eine Erklärung zu verlangen."
languages.original_text: {n}His jaw clenched, Solomorne says with a frown,{/n} "If such is your wish, then it is done. I dare not demand an explanation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne beißt die Zähne zusammen und sagt mit gerunzelter Stirn:{/n} "Wenn das Euer Wunsch ist, soll es geschehen. Ich wage es nicht, eine Erklärung zu verlangen."

languages.text: {n}Le visage de Solomorne s'assombrit et il vous répond entre ses dents :{/n} « Si tel est votre souhait, qu'il en soit ainsi. Je n'attends aucune explication de votre part. »
languages.original_text: {n}His jaw clenched, Solomorne says with a frown,{/n} "If such is your wish, then it is done. I dare not demand an explanation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage de Solomorne s'assombrit et il vous répond entre ses dents :{/n} « Si tel est votre souhait, qu'il en soit ainsi. Je n'attends aucune explication de votre part. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne aprieta la mandíbula y frunce el entrecejo.{/n} «Así lo haré, si es lo que desea. No me atreveré a pedirle una explicación».
languages.original_text: {n}His jaw clenched, Solomorne says with a frown,{/n} "If such is your wish, then it is done. I dare not demand an explanation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne aprieta la mandíbula y frunce el entrecejo.{/n} «Así lo haré, si es lo que desea. No me atreveré a pedirle una explicación».

languages.text: {n}他咬紧了牙，皱着眉头，开了口。{/n}“如果这就是你的愿望，那如你所愿。我不敢要求你解释什么。”
languages.original_text: {n}His jaw clenched, Solomorne says with a frown,{/n} "If such is your wish, then it is done. I dare not demand an explanation."

traits.locale_text: {n}他咬紧了牙，皱着眉头，开了口。{/n}“如果这就是你的愿望，那如你所愿。我不敢要求你解释什么。”

languages.text: {n}Çenesi kilitlenen Solomorne, kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "İstediğin buysa bana düşen yalnızca saygı göstermektir. Açıklama talep etmeye cüret edemem."
languages.original_text: {n}His jaw clenched, Solomorne says with a frown,{/n} "If such is your wish, then it is done. I dare not demand an explanation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Çenesi kilitlenen Solomorne kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "İstediğin buysa bana düşen yalnızca saygı göstermektir. Bir açıklama talep etmeye cüret edemem."

languages.original_text: {n}His jaw clenched, Solomorne says with a frown,{/n} "If such is your wish, then it is done. I dare not demand an explanation."
